item.description:
Come join a bunch of your fellow gaming geeks on a trip to King Richard's Faire in Carver MA. See the Mud Show, jousting, and a real, live Liger. Eat overpriced medival-themed food (there was no silverware, but there was pepsi?). Bond with other nerds and maybe meet some folks you want to game with.

We'll all meet at my house at 11am, cram as many people into as few cars as possible and head out there. Tickets to the Faire are about $25, and you should budget at least another $20 for food and tips (many of the performers only get paid by passing the hat).

For more information, see http://kingrichardsfa...
item.name: King Richard's Faire
